recipesJson.name: Boy Juice
recipesJson.author: Slushy
recipesJson.description: This is what happens when your off of work for a week and nothing to do but play Music and mess with other mixers recipes ü§©@philosaphucker been wanting to mix this recipe but all I had was Flavorah boysenberry and a few other substitutes it's not your every day mix but tasty...will be ordering the rest of the flavors on my next order from China river üòÅ
